actions.name: Seed Sower

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an attack.

Effect: Connection - Leech Seed. The user freely uses Leech Seed on the triggering creature. When using Leech Seed, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to have Leech Seed also apply @Affliction[bound] 5.
